name: Paul Sinkinson
bio: Paul Sinkinson joined Cloud Cycle as Principal Front End Engineer after two decades of experience working at startups in various industries including Family History, Financial Administration and Social Media. He's been lucky to work with and learn from amazingly talented people along the way, has a passion for using technology to solve problems and is excited to join Cloud Cycle on a mission to help build a sustainable future.
